name: YusnaTalk
_source: s;Yusna;Do you regret all of this?
s;Simon;I don't think I can. It wasn't really my choice.
s;Yusna;Sure sounds like someone blessed by the Fates.|I think you do have a choice, Simon.
s;Yusna;You can run.{w} Might seem silly, but no one is forcing this.
s;Simon;After all of this?{w} Really? You want me to run?
s;Yusna;Just... no, I get it.|You want to see this through.
s;Simon;I do. And even if I do have a choice, it doesn't feel like it.
s;Yusna;I understand.{w} I do have your back.|I just wanted to suggest this.
